title: Zebulon: and Other Short Stories
description: The fascinating stories in TINKER, by award-winning author R.L. Herron, shine a light on dim places that we often choose not to talk about...war, loneliness and despair.  At the same time, they touch gently on the bright, soft things of life. They'll make you feel the subtle butterfly wings of hope that occasionally tickle our hearts. A remarkable collection. "Well done!" Reviewed by V. Reader on Amazon "Beautifully written...!" Reviewed by Darin Godby for Readers Favorite ..". although melancholy and sad, the lead story 'Tinker' is really a beautiful love story." Reviewed by Lady R on Amazon
author: R.L. Herron
